# Chris Nowicki

> Full-Stack Developer & Technology Nerd. Personal portfolio and blog covering tech tutorials, career insights, and productivity tips.

## About

Chris Nowicki is a Developer Experience Engineer who writes about web development, developer tools, and career growth in tech.

## Pages

- [Home](https://www.chrisnowicki.dev/): Portfolio homepage with latest posts, speaking engagements, and contact info
- [Blog](https://www.chrisnowicki.dev/blog): Articles on life, tech, and productivity
- [Speaking](https://www.chrisnowicki.dev/speaking): Upcoming and past speaking engagements
- [Uses](https://www.chrisnowicki.dev/uses): Software, hardware, and peripherals I use daily
- [Contact](https://www.chrisnowicki.dev/contact): Get in touch

## Blog Posts

- [The Reality of Burnout and Breaking Into Tech](https://www.chrisnowicki.dev/blog/breaking-into-tech-and-burnout): Overcoming burnout through digital detox and self-care
- [How to Secure Vercel Cron Job routes in NextJS 13](https://www.chrisnowicki.dev/blog/how-to-secure-a-vercel-cron-job): Secure Vercel cron routes with bearer token authentication
- [How to setup Vercel Postgres Serverless SQL Storage using NextJS](https://www.chrisnowicki.dev/blog/how-to-setup-vercel-postgres): Setup Vercel Postgres database with Next.js and Kysely
- [How to create a Vercel Cron Job using NextJS 13](https://www.chrisnowicki.dev/blog/how-to-create-a-vercel-cron-job): Learn to create Vercel cron jobs in Next.js
